name: Solo Resurrection
author: Parrot
content: [Innate Ability: Resurrection]&quotWhat? What&#039s with this super OP cheat skill?&quotHowever, Kang Hyeon didn&#039t know what it meant to die, want to die, and not being able to.The man who became the most infamous hunter on Earth with his immortal body!&quotAs a human disaster - no, as one against the disasters facing the human race,I will solo resurrect today as well!&quot
